mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.index

Interface IndexStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloIndexStore, JobContextIndexStore, MemoryIndexStore

    public interface IndexStore
    This is responsible for persisting index configuration (either in memory or to disk depending on the implementation).
